Recent updates in New York City highlight a troubling rise in deaths in NYPD custody, a significant increase in ICE detentions, and ongoing legal challenges regarding conditions in detention facilities, alongside community concerns over public safety and housing issues amid a backdrop of political tensions and environmental challenges.

### Emergencies & Risks

Deaths in NYPD custody have nearly doubled in recent years, raising significant concerns about police practices.
